name: Extreme Car Driving 2
description:
Extreme Car and Quad bike Driving Simulator is the best car simulator of 2015, thanks to its advanced real physics engine mode
Always wanted to try a sports car simulator? , Drift Simulator, do tricks, Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free! Take the adrenaline from the street.
Be furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!
Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so much fun!

Features
------------------------------------------
Take adrenaline
Drive with traffic !!!!!
Drift Simulator
Race car racing game
Full real HUD including speed, gear and speed.
Explore detailed open world environment.
Control your car with the steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows

* In extreme stunts
* Ease of Management
* Realistic acceleration
* Beautiful graphics
* Realistic physics
* Grand Street
* Realistic sound environment
